SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.ibm.team.workitem.common.model
Class ItemProfile

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.team.workitem.common.model.ItemProfile

public class ItemProfile
extends java.lang.Object

An item profile is a set of properties of an item type. It is used for requesting part or all of an item's properties when retrieving that item from the server. Properties are declared as constants on an item's interface. Item profiles are immutable.

Items of the Work Item component offer constants of item profiles on their public interfaces, for some other well-known types a few constants are given in this class for convenience.

Since:
0.5
See Also:
IAuditableCommon.resolveAuditable(com.ibm.team.repository.common.IAuditableHandle, ItemProfile, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor), IItem.isPropertySet(String), Type.propertyNames()

createProfile

public static ItemProfile createProfile(IItemType itemType,
                                        java.util.Collection properties)
Creates an item profile for the given item type with the given properties.

Parameters:
itemType - the item type
properties - the properties
Returns:
a new item profile

createProfile

public static ItemProfile createProfile(IItemType itemType,
                                        java.util.Collection properties,
                                        boolean containsReferences)
Creates an item profile for the given item type with the given properties. This variant is for including references in the profile, retrieval of references is usually not supported and their inclusion in a profile will be silently ignored. Retrieval of references is supported by IWorkItemWorkingCopyManager.

Parameters:
itemType - the item type
properties - the properties
containsReferences - true iff references should be contained
Returns:
a new item profile

createProfile

public static ItemProfile createProfile(IItemType itemType,
                                        java.util.Collection properties,
                                        java.util.Collection linkTypeIds)
Creates an item profile for the given item type with the given properties. This variant is for including references of the given link types in the profile. Retrieval of references is usually not supported and their inclusion in a profile will be silently ignored. Retrieval of references is supported by IWorkItemWorkingCopyManager.

Parameters:
itemType - the item type
properties - the properties
linkTypeIds - the link type identifiers
Returns:
a new item profile

public static ItemProfile createFullProfile(IItemType itemType,
                                            boolean containsReferences)
Creates a full item profile for the given item type containing all properties of that type. This variant is for including references in the profile, retrieval of references is usually not supported and their inclusion in a profile will be silently ignored. Retrieval of references is supported by IWorkItemWorkingCopyManager.

Parameters:
itemType - the item type
containsReferences - true iff references should be contained
Returns:
a new item profile

createExtension

public ItemProfile createExtension(java.util.Collection properties,
                                   boolean containsReferences)
Creates an extension of this item profile with the given additional properties. This variant is for also adding references to the profile, retrieval of references is usually not supported and their inclusion in a profile will be silently ignored. Retrieval of references is supported by IWorkItemWorkingCopyManager.

Parameters:
properties - the additional properties
containsReferences - true iff references should be contained
Returns:
a new item profile
